localApplication

Class HtmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • localApplication.HtmlParser

  • public class HtmlParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is responsible for converting the incoming data from manager (couples of images and their parsed text) to proper HTML file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HTML_AFTER_IMAGE_BEFORE_TEXT
      HTML tags to end image and start parsed text in ht
      static java.lang.String HTML_AFTER_TEXT
      Html tags constant to put after each image parsing
      static java.lang.String HTML_FOOTER
      Html footer to to write in the end of the output html file
      static java.lang.String HTML_HEADER
      Html header to to write in the start of the output html file
      static java.lang.String HTML_START_PARAGRAPH_AND_IMAGE
      HTML tags to start paragraph and image in out put file

        Returns:

      • appendListOfUrlAndTextToHTML

        Appending current images with parsed text to the html file
        Parameters:
        urlsToText - List of Pairs of String urls to String parsed text from image.
        Returns:
